Google Launches AI Edge Gallery App for Mobile AI Models

June 01, 2025 by Eolas AI
Categories: AI News, Google
Summary:

Google's AI Edge Gallery app allows users to run AI models from Hugging Face on Android, with iOS support coming soon. Models operate offline using phone processors, offering privacy and convenience without needing internet access, though performance varies by device.
